testsuite.name: Scenario: Ensure Audio works when previewing a Slidehow Question with set Duration

testcase.name: Given I am logged in as the default administrator

testcase.name: And I choose creating new Slideshow from the main dropdown button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Ensure Audio works when previewing a Slidehow Question with set Duration

testcase.name: And Slideshow Designer is opened
testcase.classname: Scenario: Ensure Audio works when previewing a Slidehow Question with set Duration

testcase.name: When I enter valid information for the question name as "New Question 1"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Ensure Audio works when previewing a Slidehow Question with set Duration

testcase.name: Then I set the duration to "10" seconds
testcase.classname: Scenario: Ensure Audio works when previewing a Slidehow Question with set Duration

testcase.name: When I click to Preview the Slideshow
testcase.classname: Scenario: Ensure Audio works when previewing a Slidehow Question with set Duration

testcase.name: Then I am previewing the Slideshow
testcase.classname: Scenario: Ensure Audio works when previewing a Slidehow Question with set Duration

testcase.classname: Scenario: Ensure Audio works when previewing a Slidehow Question with set Duration

testcase.name: And I pause playback of the Slideshow
testcase.classname: Scenario: Ensure Audio works when previewing a Slidehow Question with set Duration

testcase.name: When current playback time is greater than 0
testcase.classname: Scenario: Ensure Audio works when previewing a Slidehow Question with set Duration

testcase.name: Then I close the question preview window
testcase.classname: Scenario: Ensure Audio works when previewing a Slidehow Question with set Duration
